// TypeScript Version: 4.1

/// <reference types="@stdlib/types"/>

import { {{OUTPUT_TS_DTYPE}} as DataType, {{OUTPUT_TS_TYPED_ARRAY}} } from '@stdlib/types/array';
import * as random from '@stdlib/types/random';

/**
* Output array.
*/
type RandomArray = {{OUTPUT_TS_TYPED_ARRAY}} | Array<number>;

/**
* Interface defining PRNG options.
*/
interface PRNGOptions {
	/**
	* Pseudorandom number generator which generates uniformly distributed pseudorandom numbers.
	*/
	prng?: random.PRNG;

	/**
	* Pseudorandom number generator seed.
	*/
	seed?: random.PRNGSeedMT19937;

	/**
	* Pseudorandom number generator state.
	*/
	state?: random.PRNGStateMT19937;

	/**
	* Specifies whether to copy a provided pseudorandom number generator state. Default: true.
	*/
	copy?: boolean;
}

/**
* Interface defining factory options.
*/
interface FactoryOptions extends PRNGOptions {
	/**
	* Default output array data type. Default: '{{DEFAULT_DTYPE}}'.
	*/
	dtype?: DataType;
}

/**
* Interface defining options.
*/
interface Options {
	/**
	* Output array data type.
	*/
	dtype?: DataType;
}

/**
* Interface for PRNG properties and methods.
*/
interface PRNG {
	/**
	* Underlying pseudorandom number generator.
	*/
	readonly PRNG: random.PRNG;

	/**
	* PRNG seed.
	*/
	readonly seed: random.PRNGSeedMT19937 | null;

	/**
	* PRNG seed length.
	*/
	readonly seedLength: number | null;

	/**
	* PRNG state.
	*/
	state: random.PRNGStateMT19937 | null;

	/**
	* PRNG state length.
	*/
	readonly stateLength: number | null;

	/**
	* PRNG state size (in bytes).
	*/
	readonly byteLength: number | null;
}

/**
* Interface for generating pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}} with pre-specified parameter values.
*/
interface UnaryFunction extends PRNG {
	/**
	* Returns an array containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
	*
	* @param len - array length
	* @param options - function options
	* @returns output array
	*/
	( len: number, options?: Options ): RandomArray;

	/**
	* Fills an array with pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
	*
	* @param out - output array
	* @returns output array
	*/
	assign( out: RandomArray ): RandomArray;
}

/**
* Interface for generating pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}} without pre-specified parameter values.
*/
interface BinaryFunction extends PRNG {
	/**
	* Returns an array containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
	*
	* @param len - array length
	* @param {{PARAM_1}} - {{PARAM_1_DESC}}
	* @param options - function options
	* @returns output array
	*/
	( len: number, {{PARAM_1}}: {{PARAM_1_DTYPE}}, options?: Options ): RandomArray;

	/**
	* Fills an array with pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
	*
	* @param {{PARAM_1}} - {{PARAM_1_DESC}}
	* @param out - output array
	* @returns output array
	*/
	assign( {{PARAM_1}}: {{PARAM_1_DTYPE}}, out: RandomArray ): RandomArray;
}

/**
* Interface for generating pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
*/
interface Random extends PRNG {
	/**
	* Returns an array containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
	*
	* @param len - array length
	* @param {{PARAM_1}} - {{PARAM_1_DESC}}
	* @param options - function options
	* @returns output array
	*
	* @example
	* var out = {{ALIAS}}( 10, {{PARAM_1_VALUE}} );
	* // returns <{{DEFAULT_TYPED_ARRAY}}>
	*/
	( len: number, {{PARAM_1}}: {{PARAM_1_DTYPE}}, options?: Options ): RandomArray;

	/**
	* Fills an array with pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
	*
	* @param {{PARAM_1}} - {{PARAM_1_DESC}}
	* @param out - output array
	* @returns output array
	*
	* @example
	* var zeros = require( '@stdlib/array/zeros' );
	*
	* var x = zeros( 10, '{{DEFAULT_DTYPE}}' );
	* // returns <{{DEFAULT_TYPED_ARRAY}}>
	*
	* var out = {{ALIAS}}( {{PARAM_1_VALUE}}, out );
	* // returns <{{DEFAULT_TYPED_ARRAY}}>
	*
	* var bool = ( out === x );
	* // returns true
	*/
	assign( {{PARAM_1}}: {{PARAM_1_DTYPE}}, out: RandomArray ): RandomArray;

	/**
	* Returns a function for creating arrays containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
	*
	* ## Notes
	*
	* -   When provided `{{PARAM_1}}`, the returned function returns random variates drawn from the specified distribution.
	*
	* @param {{PARAM_1}} - {{PARAM_1_DESC}}
	* @param options - function options
	* @throws `{{PARAM_1}}` {{PARAM_1_THROWS_DESC}}
	* @throws must provide a valid state
	* @returns function for creating arrays
	*
	* @example
	* var random = {{ALIAS}}.factory( {{PARAM_1_VALUE}} );
	*
	* var out = random( 10 );
	* // returns <{{DEFAULT_TYPED_ARRAY}}>
	*
	* @example
	* var random = {{ALIAS}}.factory( {{PARAM_1_VALUE}}, {
	*     'seed': 297
	* });
	* var out = random( 10 );
	* // returns <{{DEFAULT_TYPED_ARRAY}}>
	*/
	factory( {{PARAM_1}}: {{PARAM_1_DTYPE}}, options?: FactoryOptions ): UnaryFunction;

	/**
	* Returns a function for creating arrays containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
	*
	* ## Notes
	*
	* -   When not provided `{{PARAM_1}}`, the returned function requires that `{{PARAM_1}}` be provided at each invocation.
	*
	* @param options - function options
	* @throws must provide a valid state
	* @returns function for creating arrays
	*
	* @example
	* var random = {{ALIAS}}.factory();
	*
	* var out = random( 10, {{PARAM_1_VALUE}} );
	* // returns <{{DEFAULT_TYPED_ARRAY}}>
	*
	* @example
	* var random = {{ALIAS}}.factory({
	*     'seed': 297
	* });
	* var out = random( 10, {{PARAM_1_VALUE}} );
	* // returns <{{DEFAULT_TYPED_ARRAY}}>
	*/
	factory( options?: FactoryOptions ): BinaryFunction;
}

/**
* Returns an array containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
*
* @param len - array length
* @param {{PARAM_1}} - {{PARAM_1_DESC}}
* @param options - function options
* @returns output array
*
* @example
* var out = {{ALIAS}}( 10, {{PARAM_1_VALUE}} );
* // returns <{{DEFAULT_TYPED_ARRAY}}>
*
* @example
* var random = {{ALIAS}}.factory( {{PARAM_1_VALUE}} );
*
* var out = random( 10 );
* // returns <{{DEFAULT_TYPED_ARRAY}}>
*/
declare var {{ALIAS}}: Random;


// EXPORTS //

export = {{ALIAS}};
